original_text: The same thing will happen to you, people of Bethel, because of the wicked things that you have done. 10: Bethel means ‘House of God’ so here it may mean all the people of Israel. When the day of your punishment arrives, the king of Israel will surely die.’ The same thing will happen to you, people of Bethel,
korean_text: 너희의 큰 악으로 말미암아 벧엘이 이같이 너희에게 행하리니 이스라엘 왕이 새벽에 정녕 망하리로다

sentences.original_text: The same thing will happen to you
because of the wicked things that you have done
so here it may mean all the people of Israel
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 여기서는 이스라엘 모든 백성을 의미할 수 있다

sentences.original_text: When the day of your punishment arrives
the king of Israel will surely die
The same thing will happen to you
